meta_description: The official support agency for arts and culture in The Palm Beaches, serving Palm Beach County cultural organizations, artists and destinations.
hours_text:
# Plan Your Trip to  
The Palm Beaches

Get ready to soak in all the culture under the sun in The Palm Beaches.  
Discover convenient travel options, places to stay, a free cultural travel guide and more.

## Let’s Get Started

#### Getting Here

Fly direct to Palm Beach International Airport (PBI), or take the Brightline into town. And, getting around town is easy by trolley, bus, taxi or car with plentiful parking.

[ Explore Options > ](http://web.archive.org/web/20250928212159/https://www.thepalmbeaches.com/getting-there)

#### Where to Stay

From luxury properties to affordable beachfront accommodations, stay just steps away from endless arts & cultural hotspots— available for every style and budget.

[ Book Your Trip > ](http://web.archive.org/web/20250928212159/https://www.thepalmbeaches.com/places-to-stay)

#### Take the Train

Leave the driving to someone else when traveling to West Palm Beach and Boca Raton via Brightline from Miami, Fort Lauderdale, and Orlando.

[ Get Your Tickets > ](http://web.archive.org/web/20250928212159/https://www.gobrightline.com/)

### Insider Access Blog

[View More](/web/20250928212159/https://www.palmbeachculture.com/explore/insider-access-blog/)

[ Insider Access ](http://web.archive.org/web/20250928212159/https://www.palmbeachculture.com/category/insider-access/ "View all Insider Access") Sep 19, 2025

admission_text:
### Become a Cultural Organization Member

Palm Beach County is a vibrant place where arts and culture are woven into everyday life—for residents and visitors alike. That’s thanks in large part to the incredible work of organizations like yours. The Cultural Council for Palm Beach County is proud to support that work through our Cultural Organization Membership program.

### Why Join?

As the county’s local arts service agency, we’re dedicated to advocating for your organization, supporting your growth, and uplifting the entire cultural sector. Membership with the Cultural Council helps fuel this important work.

We advocate on your behalf at the local, state, and federal levels, ensuring the arts remain a strong priority in public policy and funding. We support your team’s professional development through the Institute for Cultural Advancement, offering workshops and resources tailored for cultural organizations and creative professionals. To help your organization grow, we provide free online tools such as a job bank, a cultural events calendar, and a library of advocacy research and materials.

We also work to raise the visibility of our cultural community through strategic marketing, public relations efforts, and co-op advertising—all designed to drive cultural tourism in The Palm Beaches. Our signature events and promotions help shine a spotlight on the incredible experiences that organizations like yours create year-round.

### Recognition & Opportunities
